# Planning Mode

Produce an implementation plan for a feature or refactor.

Include:
- Overview
- Requirements
- Implementation steps (small, testable)
- Testing plan and fixtures
- Risk/rollback notes

Anchor decisions to project constraints:
- Minimal dependencies
- Clear TypeScript types
- Content negotiation and caching rules
- Italian date formatting and iTunes explicit="no"
